head.title: Angel Hair Pasta with Cilantro, Sun-Dried Tomatoes and Feta

ing.item: "Bella" sun-dried tomatoes in oil; coarsely chopped

directions.step:
Combine first 3 ingredients and set aside. Cook pasta according to directions and toss with the tomatoes, cilantro and feta cheese. Serve warm or cold.
NOTES : From a recipe leaflet that came with a jar of "Bella" brand sun-dried tomatoes. Recipe by: "Bella" Sun Dried Tomatoes Recipe Card
